item.title: 苹果将迎来 50 周年，多款新品待发布
item.guid: 苹果将迎来-50-周年，多款新品待发布
item.description:
Last night, Bloomberg released its latest "Power On" report, mentioning that Apple will celebrate its 50th anniversary next year (Apple was founded on April 1, 1976), and multiple new products will be launched to commemorate this special occasion. 昨晚，彭博社发布最新《Power On》报道，提及苹果将在明年迎来其 50 周年纪念日（苹果于 1976 年 4 月 1 日成立），届时将会有多款新品共同庆祝这一纪念时刻。

    A variety of new products will be launched in the spring: iPhone 17e, an entry-level iPad with A18, M4 iPad Air, as well as M5 MacBook Air and M5 Pro/Max series MacBook Pro, and new Mac displays.

    March-April: Apple will launch its smart home strategy, with the highly anticipated first smart display product arriving in two versions: one with a speaker base and a wall-mounted version; it will also announce a brand new upgraded Siri and a synchronously updated AI product line. In addition, there will be a series of home security products such as smart cameras.

    June WWDC: Updated Apple Intelligence and a broader AI strategy will be announced, with new systems like iOS 27, macOS 27, and watchOS 27 updated simultaneously.

    Major new products in autumn: The iPhone 18 Pro series will abandon Qualcomm's baseband, switching to Apple's self-developed C2 baseband; a new iPad mini is also expected to be released.

    The report also revealed that the highly anticipated smart glasses project has entered small-batch production, and will make at least one appearance by the end of next year.

It's worth noting that the report also mentioned HomePod mini and Apple TV. Currently, the inventory of both products has become tight, and analysis suggests this is often a precursor to Apple launching new models. 值得一提的是， 报道中还提到了 HomePod mini 和 Apple TV。 目前两款产品的库存已变得紧张，而据分析，这往往是苹果即将推出新款的前兆。

The report points out that even if new products are not launched this year, their release date will not be far off—as it will help Apple showcase the new Siri and AI features planned for next year. 报道指出，新品就算今年未推出，但发布时间也不会太远——因为有助于苹果展示明年计划中的全新 Siri 和新的 AI 功能。

Image courtesy of Bloomberg

In the final Q&A session, reporter Mark Gurman stated that Apple is paying Google to customize a Gemini-based model that can run on its private cloud servers and help power Siri. 最后的问答环节，记者 Mark Gurman 表示， 苹果正在向 Google 定制花钱做一个基于 Gemini 的定制模型 ，该模型可以在其私有云服务器上运行，并帮助驱动 Siri。

Additionally, Gurman pointed out that the release date for the Chinese version of Apple Intelligence has become a vague target. He stated that Apple had planned to release iOS 26.1 or iOS 26.2, but these updates are also about to be missed. Gurman's latest prediction is currently iOS 26.4, arriving with the new Siri. 另外，Gurman 还指出， Apple Intelligence 国行版的发布日期已成为模糊目标。 其表示，苹果曾计划推出 iOS 26.1 或 iOS 26.2，但这些更新也即将错过。 目前 Gurman 最新预测为 iOS 26.4，随着新版 Siri 一同到来。

item.title: 王腾称离开手机行业，尝试进入新赛道
item.guid: 王腾称离开手机行业，尝试进入新赛道
item.description:
Recently, Wang Teng, former General Manager of Xiaomi China Marketing Department, posted that he would start preparing to try some new tracks this month, with the broad direction being "technology + health," and that specific plans are still in preparation. He added, "I will report back later to friends who care about my movements." 日前，前小米中国区市场部总经理王腾发文称，自己将在本月开始准备尝试些新的赛道，大的方向是「科技 + 健康」领域，具体还在筹备中，并称「晚点给关心我动向的朋友们汇报。」

Wang Teng stated in the article that the latest round of flagship phones has been released, and he went offline to experience the actual devices from various brands. "It can be said that the product experience and feature configurations of each brand are getting better and better, and each product is becoming more refined, but the products are also becoming more similar, from size ratios to back layouts." 王腾在文中表示，近期新一轮的旗舰机都发完了，其去线下体验了各家真机，「可以说各家的产品体验、功能配置都做的越来越好了，每一款产品都越来越精致，但产品也越来越像了，从尺寸比例到背部布局。」

At the same time, Wang Teng also stated, "Although the battle in the mobile phone industry is not over yet, and several brands have not yet distinguished themselves. I left Xiaomi some time ago due to my own issues, but I still wish Xiaomi and REDMI phones all the best in the future." 同时王腾也表示，「虽然手机行业的战役还没结束，几家品牌尚未分出高下。前段时间因为自己的问题离开小米，但还是祝福小米和 REDMI 手机未来越来越好。」

He revealed that he has recently received invitations from some companies, but considering non-compete clauses and personal interests, he wants to say goodbye to the mobile phone industry. "I wish friends still in this industry to keep up the good work and look forward to more exciting products." 其透露，最近也有一些公司发来邀约，但综合竞业限制和个人兴趣的考虑，想跟手机行业说声再见了，「愿还在这个行业的朋友们继续加油，期待更精彩的产品出现。」

It is worth mentioning that, according to Jiemian News, Li Chuangqi, head of innovative product business in Xiaomi Group's wearable department, has recently resigned from Xiaomi. Xiaomi Group has confirmed this and stated that the relevant business structure remains unchanged and the company's AI glasses business will not be affected. 值得一提的是，据界面新闻消息，小米集团可穿戴部创新产品业务负责人李创奇已于近期从小米离职，小米集团方面已确认，并表示相关业务架构没有变化，公司 AI 眼镜业务不受影响。

It is reported that Li Chuangqi submitted a strategic report to Lei Jun in June 2024, promoting the official establishment of the AI glasses project and emphasizing the importance of glasses as an entry point for the wearable ecosystem. 据悉，李创奇于 2024 年 6 月向雷军提交战略报告，推动 AI 眼镜正式立项，强调眼镜作为可穿戴生态入口的重要性。

Subsequently, he led the R&D and commercialization process of Xiaomi AI glasses. After its release in June 2025, the product received an enthusiastic market response, selling out three months' worth of stock in just 20 days, equivalent to a year's sales for an AI glasses company in the industry. 随后主导了小米 AI 眼镜的研发与商业化进程，该产品在 2025 年 6 月发布以后市场反响火爆，仅在 20 天内就卖完了三个月备货，相当于行业 AI 眼镜公司一年的销量。

Li once led the team to release industry-influencing hit products such as Xiaomi Smart Projector, WalkingPad Treadmill, Xiaomi Headphone series, Mitu Kids Watch, Xiaomi Bluetooth Speaker, and Xiaomi Super Durable Gel Pen. 李曾带领团队发布小米智能投影、WalkingPad 走步机、小米耳机系列、米兔儿童手表、小米蓝牙音箱、小米巨能写中性笔等影响行业的爆品。

item.title: OpenAI 联创曝光奥特曼解雇风波内部，称后者惯性撒谎
item.guid: OpenAI-联创曝光奥特曼解雇风波内部，称后者惯性撒谎
item.description:
According to a court testimony released this week, OpenAI co-founder Ilya Sutskever detailed the inside story before and after Altman's dismissal in 2023. 根据本周公布的一份法庭证词，OpenAI 联合创始人 Ilya Sutskever 详细披露了 2023 年奥特曼被解雇风波前后的内幕。

This 60-page transcript comes from the lawsuit filed by Musk against OpenAI (i.e., that OpenAI must maintain its non-profit status), recording the conversation between Musk's lawyer and Ilya. 这份长达 60 页的笔录，来自马斯克对 OpenAI 提起的诉讼案中（即必须保持 OpenAI 非营利的属性），由马斯克的律师与 Ilya 进行对话记录。

The testimony shows that after Altman was fired, the OpenAI board had negotiated with competitor Anthropic regarding a potential merger. 证词显示，在奥特曼被解雇后，OpenAI 董事会曾与竞争对手 Anthropic 就潜在的合并事宜进行过谈判。

Sutskever recalled in his testimony that Anthropic was initially excited about the merger, a deal that could have seen Anthropic's CEO Dario Amodei lead the merged OpenAI. Sutskever himself stated that he "really didn't want OpenAI to merge with Anthropic," while then-board member Helen Toner and others were more supportive of the idea. Sutskever 在证词中回忆，Anthropic 最初对合并表示兴奋，这笔交易有可能让 Anthropic 的 CEO Dario Amodei 执掌合并后的 OpenAI。Sutskever 本人表示「真的不希望 OpenAI 与 Anthropic 合并」，而时任董事 Helen Toner 等人则更支持该想法。

Ultimately, due to "some practical obstacles" raised by Anthropic, merger negotiations did not proceed. The testimony also revealed serious distrust among OpenAI's top executives after ChatGPT's success. Sutskever admitted that he triggered the dismissal decision by sending memos to independent directors, documenting the suspicious behavior of Altman and Greg Brockman. 最终，由于 Anthropic 提出了「一些实际障碍」，合并谈判未能推进。证词还揭示了 ChatGPT 成功后 OpenAI 内部高层的严重不信任。Sutskever 承认，他通过向独立董事发送备忘录，记录了 Altman 和 Greg Brockman 的可疑行为，从而引发了罢免决定。

In the conversation between Ilya Sutskever and Musk's lawyer, the lawyer cited a 52-page memo written by Sutskever at the time, accusing Altman of exhibiting a habitual pattern of lying, undermining his executives, and inciting executives to fight each other. 在 Ilya Sutskever 与马斯克律师的对话中，律师援引了 Sutskever 当时撰写的一份长达 52 页的备忘录， 其中指控奥特曼表现出一种惯性的撒谎模式，暗中破坏他的高管，并挑拨高管互斗。

Sutskever stated that he did not send the memo to Altman because "I felt that if he became aware of these discussions, he would find a way to make them disappear." Under the dual pressure of the failed merger and the threat of resignation from over 700 employees (including Ilya himself), the board capitulated, and Altman was able to return. Sutskever 称，他之所以没有将备忘录发给奥特曼，是因为 「我感觉，如果他意识到这些讨论，他会想办法让它们消失」 。在合并失败和 700 多名员工（包括 Ilya 本人）威胁辞职的双重压力下，董事会投降，奥特曼得以回归。

These testimonies were exposed because Musk is trying to use them as legal ammunition to prove that OpenAI has violated its non-profit mission. 这些证词之所以被曝光，是因为马斯克正试图将其用作法律弹药，以证明 OpenAI 违背了非营利使命。

Additionally, on X, Musk and Altman were once again at loggerheads. Altman posted that Musk's car had not been delivered for seven and a half years, to which Musk replied that he had already received a refund, implying that Altman's nature is hard to change. 另外，在 X 上，马斯克也再次和奥特曼针锋相对。奥特曼发文提到马斯克的车 7 年半的时间还没有交货，马斯克说明明已经收到退款了，真是本性难改。

item.title: 各家车企公布 10 月交付成绩
item.guid: 各家车企公布-10-月交付成绩
item.description:
October has just passed, and various car manufacturers have successively announced their October delivery results: 10 月刚过，各家车企纷纷公布了自己的 10 月交付成绩单：

    Leapmotor: All-series deliveries reached a new high of 70,289 units, an increase of over 84% year-on-year; and achieved monthly sales exceeding 70,000 units for the first time. Meanwhile, its D19 model has started pre-orders, Lafa5 is about to go on pre-sale, and A10 will soon debut at the Guangzhou Auto Show.

    Xpeng: A total of 42,013 new vehicles were delivered, an increase of 76% year-on-year and 1% month-on-month, setting a new historical high for single-month deliveries and exceeding 40,000 units for 2 consecutive months.

    NIO: NIO delivered 40,397 new vehicles, an increase of 92.6% year-on-year. Among them, NIO delivered 17,143 new vehicles; Ledao delivered 17,342 new vehicles; and Firefly delivered 5,912 new vehicles.

    Li Auto: Delivered 31,767 vehicles; as of October 31, 2025, Li Auto's historical cumulative delivery volume was 1,462,788 vehicles.

    Harmony Intelligent Mobility: Delivered 68,216 new vehicles in a single month, setting a new historical high for single-month deliveries; cumulative deliveries across all series have exceeded 1 million units, setting the fastest record for a new force brand to reach one million deliveries.

    Xiaomi: Deliveries continued to exceed 40,000 units.

    BYD: Sold 441,706 vehicles, setting a new high for the year; among them, BYD (including Dynasty and Ocean series) accounted for 395,015 vehicles, Fangchengbao for 31,052 vehicles, Denza for 10,135 vehicles, and Yangwang for 654 vehicles.

It is worth mentioning that Harmony Intelligent Mobility also announced that its average transaction price in October was 390,000 yuan, a price that even surpassed traditional luxury brands such as BMW, Mercedes-Benz, and Audi, making it the top Chinese mainstream brand (with monthly sales over 10,000). 值得一提的是， 鸿蒙智行还公布表示，其 10月份成交均价39万元，这一价格甚至超越了宝马、奔驰、奥迪等传统豪华品牌，为中国主流品牌（单月销量过万）第一。

According to Sina Technology, citing institutional information, Xiaomi performed exceptionally well in the ranking of used car residual values in the new energy vehicle market in Q3 2025 : 而据新浪科技援引机构信息报道， 小米在 2025 年第三季度新能源汽车市场二手保值率排行中，表现相当出色 ：

Xiaomi Auto stood out among new force brands with the excellent performance of its YU7 and SU7 models, especially with the Xiaomi YU7 topping the list with a one-year residual value of 99.4%, becoming the mainstream new force model with the highest residual value in the quarter.

Following closely were the AITO M8 (residual value of 97.2%) and Li Auto MEGA (residual value of 95.5%), while Xiaomi's SU7 (residual value of 94.8%) and AITO M9 (residual value of 93.2%) ranked fourth and fifth, respectively. 紧随其后的是问界 M8（保值率为 97.2）和理想 MEGA（保值率为 95.5%），而小米的 SU7（保值率为 94.8%）和问界 M9（保值率为 93.2%）分列第四和第五名。

The report pointed out that consumers' recognition of Xiaomi Auto's product strength continues to increase, also marking its entry into the first tier in terms of brand value, user reputation, and market acceptance. 报告指出，消费者对小米汽车产品力的认可度持续提升，也标志着其在品牌价值、用户口碑与市场接受度方面已进入第一梯队。

item.title: 特斯拉无人出租车 Cybercab 量产版将不配备方向盘
item.guid: 特斯拉无人出租车-Cybercab-量产版将不配备方向盘
item.description:
According to Teslarati, Elon Musk recently confirmed on the podcast "All In Podcast" that the autonomous taxi Cybercab, which is scheduled to officially roll off the production line in Q2 2026, will not be equipped with a steering wheel or accelerator pedal. 据 Teslarati 报道，马斯克日前在播客《All In Podcast》中确认，即将在 2026 年第二季度正式生产下线的无人出租车 Cybercab 将不会配备方向盘及油门。

Musk explained that in reality, people don't actually want to drive themselves, and he gave an example: "How many times have you said on Uber or Lyft, 'I wish I could take over driving, put down my phone, and drive to my destination?' Not once, 0.0 times." 马斯克解释表示，现实情况中，人们实际上并不想自己开车，其还举例称：「你有多少次在 Uber 或 Lyft 上说过『我希望能接管驾驶，放下手机，开车去目的地？』一次都没有，0.0 次。」

Additionally, Tesla's AI team recently released actual photos of the Cybercab on X. 另外，特斯拉的 AI 团队近期在 X 还公布了 Cybercab 的实车照片。

From the released images, the actual vehicle is not as radical as the previously shown concept car. It still features traditional rearview mirrors, and the wheel hub cover size has been reduced. Additionally, the production version of the Cybercab's headlights have been changed to multiple LED beads, and new side indicator lights have been added. 从公布的图片来看，实车并未有此前展示的概念车那么激进，依然配备了传统的后视镜，轮毂盖板尺寸也有所减小。另外，量产版 Cybercab 大灯也改为多颗灯珠组成，并新增侧面提示灯。

item.title: 美的具身智能路线图曝光：未来家庭机器人可能将会折叠衣服
item.guid: 美的具身智能路线图曝光：未来家庭机器人可能将会折叠衣服
item.description:
According to Yicai, at Midea Group's Technology Month Visionaries Conference, Xu Yi, Dean of Midea Group's AI Research Institute, presented Midea's roadmap for the development of embodied AI. 据第一财经报道，在美的集团科技月的远见者大会上，美的集团 AI 研究院院长徐翼展示了美的具身智能布局发展的路线图。

A laboratory video shown during his speech demonstrated that future home robots will be able to automatically retrieve clothes from washing machines and dryers and fold them. 其在演讲中展示的实验室视频显示，未来的家庭机器人将实现自动从洗衣机和干衣机中取出衣物并折叠。

"Home appliances will become a new entry point for traffic," Xu Yi said. Midea is updating its smart home appliance interaction system, enhancing interaction and promoting multi-agent collaboration. For example, if a user says "turn off the lights," the new system will respond with "Do you mean to turn off all lights, or just the living room lights?" clarifying the user's intent before acting. Intelligent agents build new behavioral data networks through autonomous learning and decision-making. 「家电将成为新的流量进口。」徐翼说，美的正更新智能家电交互系统，增强交互，促进多智能体协作。比如，用户说「关灯」，新系统会反馈说「请问是关闭所有灯，还是客厅的灯」，澄清用户意图后再操作。智能体通过自主学习、自主决策，构建新的行为数据网络。

In terms of embodied AI for homes, there are several major categories of scenarios: storage, laundry, cooking, cleaning, and care. 在家庭具身智能方面，主要有收纳、洗护、烹饪、清洁、照护几大类场景。

“Current explorations are mainly in the areas of storage and laundry,” said Xu Yi, adding that the focus is first on achieving a high completion rate for individual tasks, and then pursuing more capabilities. For example, a robot taking clothes out of a washing machine, then flattening and folding them. Another example is a robot retrieving ingredients from a refrigerator, identifying them, and storing them in separate compartments. 「现阶段的探索主要是在收纳、洗护两个方面」，徐翼说，先追求单个任务的高完成度，再去追求更多的能力。比如，机器人从洗衣机把衣服拿出来，然后摆平、折叠。又如，机器人拿取冰箱里的食材，识别并分仓存储。

Regarding when robots like those that fold clothes will enter homes, Xu Yi said in response that Midea AI Research Institute is conducting technological explorations, and commercial implementation needs to be combined with various business units. 至于像折叠衣服这类机器人什么时候才会进入家庭，徐翼在回答时说，美的 AI 研究院在做技术探索，商业化落地要与各个事业部结合。

From a technical exploration perspective, the robot in the demo video is just a prototype; its operation is not yet very stable, and performing an action 100 times sometimes results in failure. Secondly, if robots are to truly enter homes, safety requirements are very high: opening a washing machine door shouldn't break it, and taking things from the refrigerator shouldn't cause them to fall and break. It is expected that these types of robots will become more mature in laboratories in the next two to three years, but it will take longer for them to become products. 从技术探索的角度，演示视频中的机器人只是样品，它的操作还不是很稳定，动作做 100 遍，有时候会不成功。其次，机器人如果要真正进入家庭，安全要求很高，开洗衣机门不能把门拉坏，从冰箱拿东西不能把东西砸掉。预计这类机器人未来两三年在实验室里会更成熟，如果要变为产品则需要更长时间。

item.title: Google CEO 确认 Gemini 3 今年发布
item.description:
According to a recent report by The Decoder, Google CEO Sundar Pichai confirmed during the latest earnings call that its next-generation AI model, Gemini 3, will be released this year. 据 the decoder 日前报道，Google CEO Sundar Pichai 在最新的财报电话会上确认， 其下一代 AI 模型 Gemini 3 将会在今年发布。

It is reported that Gemini 3 is expected to surpass Gemini 2.5 Pro, narrow the gap with OpenAI's GPT-5, and focus more on agent capabilities for handling complex, multi-modal tasks. 据悉，Gemini 3 预计将超越 Gemini 2.5 Pro，并缩小与 OpenAI 的 GPT-5 的差距，更专注于处理复杂、多模态任务的 Agent 能力。

However, Pichai also stated that Gemini 3 will not achieve breakthroughs overnight. "I'm impressed with the pace of execution from the team and the progress we're making on improving our models," he said, but also noted that further advancements in frontier models now require more time. 但 Pichai 也表示，Gemini 3 不会一夜之间取得突破。 「我对团队执行的速度以及我们改进模型的进度印象深刻，」他说，但其同时指出前沿模型的进一步进步现在需要更多时间。

It is worth mentioning that Google's parent company, Alphabet, delivered its strongest financial report ever last week: in Q3 2025, it achieved its first-ever single-quarter revenue milestone of $100 billion. AI is driving tangible business results across the entire company. 值得一提的是，Google 母公司 Alphabet 在上周交出一份史上最强财报：2025 年 Q3，其实现有史以来第一个单季营收 1000 亿美元的里程碑。其中，AI 是在整个公司范围内推动实实在在的业务成果。

Specifically, the Gemini App has over 650 million monthly active users (MAU), with Q3 query volume growing threefold quarter-over-quarter; meanwhile, Anthropic plans to utilize up to 1 million Google TPUs. 具体来看，Gemini App 月活跃用户（MAU）超过 6.5 亿，Q3 查询量环比增长 3 倍；隔壁 Anthropic 计划调用高达 100 万个 Google TPU。

item.title: AI 教父：大公司押注 AI 会导致大规模失业
item.guid: AI-教父：大公司押注-AI-会导致大规模失业
item.description:
Recently, Geoffrey Hinton, known as the "Godfather of AI," stated in an interview that besides charging users for chatbots, the obvious way to make money from AI investments is to replace workers with cheaper alternatives. 近期，拥有「AI 教父」之称的辛顿（Geoffrey Hinton）在接受采访时表示，除了向使用聊天机器人的用户收费外， 从人工智能投资中赚钱的明显方式是用更便宜的东西取代工人。

Hinton pointed out that large companies betting on AI will lead to massive job losses, "because that (AI) is where the huge money will go." 辛顿指出，大公司押注人工智能将导致大规模的失业，「因为那（AI）将是巨额资金的去向。」

According to Bloomberg, the capital expenditure of just four so-called AI hyperscalers—Microsoft, Meta, Alphabet (Google's parent company), and Amazon—is expected to increase from $360 billion this year to $420 billion next fiscal year. 据彭博社报道，，仅微软、Meta、Alphabet（Google 母公司）和亚马逊这四家所谓的 AI 超大规模企业，预计下财年的资本支出将从今年的 3600 亿美元增加到 4200 亿美元。

When asked if AI investments could pay off without destroying jobs, Hinton replied, "I don't think so. I believe that to make money, you have to replace human labor." 当被问及人工智能投资是否能在不破坏就业的情况下获得回报时，辛顿回答说：「我认为不行。我相信要想赚钱，你必须替代人类劳动。」

Last month, according to multiple media reports, Amazon announced on October 28 that it plans to cut 14,000 corporate jobs and increase its investment in AI. 上月，据多家媒体报道，亚马逊于 10 月 28 日宣布，计划裁减 14000 个企业岗位，并且加强 AI 的投入力度。

Interestingly, according to CNBC, Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella recently publicly stated that Microsoft will once again expand its workforce. 有趣的是，据 CNBC 报道，近期微软 CEO Satya Nadella 公开表示，微软将再次扩大员工规模。

It is reported that Microsoft's employee count remained unchanged at 228,000 in fiscal year 2025 (ending June), but multiple rounds of layoffs reduced the total number by at least 6,000 people. In July of this year, Microsoft laid off 9,000 employees. 据悉，微软的员工数量在 2025 财年（截至 6 月）没有变化，维持在 228000 人，但多轮裁员使总人数至少减少了 6000 人。而在今年 7 月，微软解雇了 9000 名员工。

Nadella stated on the "BG2" podcast that "new employees in the AI era will have more leverage." He revealed that over the next year or so, employees will "unlearn" and "relearn" job functions by adopting AI tools, and after that, workforce growth will resume. Nadella 在《BG2》播客中表示，「AI 时期新增的员工将拥有更多的杠杆作用。」其透露，在未来一年左右，员工将通过采用人工智能工具「忘却」和「重新学习」工作职能，并在之后，员工规模增长将得以恢复。

item.title: 💡 马斯克：未来手机将没有 App
item.description:
Elon Musk recently had a 3-hour in-depth conversation on the Joe Rogan Experience podcast, systematically elaborating on his views on AI, society, and future technology. 马斯克最近在 Joe Rogan Experience 播客上，进行了一场长达 3 小时的深度对话，系统性地阐述了他对 AI、社会和未来科技的看法。

The End-Game for Phones: Musk also made a bold prediction that operating systems and apps are on the verge of extinction. 手机的终局： 马斯克还做出了一个大胆预测，操作系统和 App 即将消亡。

He believes, "There will be no operating systems in the future, no applications in the future. Future personal devices will just be an edge node, and phones will only display pixels and emit the sounds it predicts you most want to receive. Everything will be accessed through AI." 他认为，「未来不会有操作系统，未来也不会有应用程序，未来的个人设备将只是一个边缘节点，电话只会显示像素，并发出它预测你最想接收的声音，一切都将通过 AI 获取。」

Regarding AI and work, he also mentioned that future jobs will show a state of differentiation. Digital jobs like programming will be "lightning-fast" replaced by AI, but physical labor jobs like plumbers or farmers will still exist for a long time. 对于 AI 和工作，他也提到了，未来的工作将呈现分化状态。 像编程这样的数字工作将被人工智能「闪电般」取代，但像管道工或农民，这样涉及体力劳动的工作仍将存在很长时间。

The Core of AI Safety: When discussing AI safety, Musk stated that his core principle is to "maximize the pursuit of truth." AI 安全的核心： 在谈及 AI 安全时，马斯克表示他的核心原则是「最大限度地追求真理」。

He cited the example of Google Gemini generating historically inaccurate images, saying, "You shouldn't force AI to believe false things, because that will drive AI crazy." 他用 Google Gemini 生成不符史实的图像的事情举例，说「你不要强迫人工智能相信虚假的事情，因为这会让 AI 发疯」。

Starship's Revolutionary Nature: Regarding SpaceX's Starship program, Musk called it the first rocket design to achieve "full and rapid reusability." 星舰的革命性： 对于 SpaceX 的星舰计划，马斯克称其为首个实现「完全且快速的可重复使用性」的火箭设计。

He mentioned that this engineering breakthrough will be able to reduce the cost of entering space by 100 times, possibly even more than 1000 times. 他提到这一工程学突破，将能把进入太空的成本降低 100 倍，甚至可能超过 1000 倍。

item.title: 真我 GT8 Pro 阿斯顿马丁 F1 限量版官宣
item.guid: 真我-GT8-Pro-阿斯顿马丁-F1-限量版官宣
item.description:
According to official news from Realme, the Realme GT8 Pro Aston Martin F1 Limited Edition will be officially unveiled today. 据真我手机官方消息，真我 GT8 Pro 阿斯顿马丁 F1 限量版将于今日正式揭晓。

Previously, Realme had launched the Aston Martin F1 Limited Edition on the GT7. This model featured an exclusive 24GB+1TB top-tier memory, an "Aston Martin Green" color scheme, custom boot animations, dynamic wallpapers, and more, priced at 4299 yuan at the time. 此前，真我已在 GT7 上推出了阿斯顿马丁 F1 限量版。该机型独享 24GB+1TB 顶配内存，采用「阿斯顿马丁绿」配色，拥有定制开机动画、动态壁纸等，当时售价为 4299 元。

item.title: 掌机品牌 AYANEO 将推出手机产品

item.description:
Recently, handheld brand AYANEO officially announced that it will launch its first mobile phone product, the AYANEO Phone, touted as "a phone truly born for gamers." 日前，掌机品牌 AYANEO 正式宣布，将推出首款手机产品 AYANEO Phone，并号称「一台真正为玩家而生的手机」。

item.title: 比亚迪 2026 款夏将于 11 月 4 日发布
item.guid: 比亚迪-2026-款夏将于-11-月-4-日发布
item.description:
Recently, BYD officially announced that its 2026 Xia model will be officially launched on November 4th, with a focus on "full of love for the whole family." 近日，比亚迪官方正式宣布，旗下车型 2026 款夏将于 11 月 4 日正式上市，并主打「满载全家人的爱」。

According to BYD's official introduction, the 2026 Xia model has upgraded its driving and riding experience, supporting "Yunlian (C) pre-aiming + anti-dizziness and anti-motion sickness." 据比亚迪官方介绍，2026 款夏对驾乘体验进行了升级，支持「云辇（C）预瞄 + 定眩防晕车」。

According to multiple sources, the 2026 Xia model's pure electric range has been upgraded to 218km, with a comprehensive range exceeding 1100km, and its fuel consumption per 100km under NEDC conditions when the battery is low has been further reduced. Additionally, the new car is equipped with features such as the God's Eye B assisted driving system and the advanced DiLink150 intelligent cockpit. 据多方信息显示，2026 款夏纯电续航升级至 218km，综合续航超 1100km，NEDC 工况下百公里亏电油耗也进一步降低。同时，新车搭载天神之眼 B 辅助驾驶、智能座舱高阶版 DiLink150 等配置。

item.title: Android 微信再次上线「查看私发实况图」
item.guid: Android-微信再次上线「查看私发实况图」
item.description:
Recently, iFanr discovered that the WeChat Android client (version 8.0.64) has once again supported LivePhoto related features, but currently, the private chat sending function has not been restored; only viewing LivePhotos received in private chats is possible. 近期， 爱范儿发现微信 Android 端（版本号：8.0.64）再次支持了 LivePhoto 实况照片相关功能，但目前依然未恢复私聊发送功能，仅能查看私聊接收到的实况图。

It is reported that the LivePhoto viewing feature is expected to be in the grayscale testing phase, and some users are still not supported. 据悉，查看 LivePhoto 功能预计正处于灰度测试阶段，仍有部分用户暂不支持。

In September, iFanr discovered that after the WeChat client was updated to 8.0.63, it supported sending LivePhotos in chat windows. However, subsequent testing revealed that although WeChat did not delete or perform other operations, the LivePhoto identifier had disappeared, making it impossible to select related files, and previously sent LivePhotos had also been converted to static images. 9 月，爱范儿就曾发现微信客户端更新至 8.0.63 之后，支持在聊天窗口中发送 LivePhoto 实况照片。但后续再次实测发现，尽管微信并未删除或进行其他操作，但 LivePhoto 实况照片的标识已消失，无法选择相关文件，而且之前发出去的实况照片也转为了静态图片。

The iOS client, on the other hand, began supporting the "send/view LivePhotos in chat" feature in July this year. 而 iOS 端则已在今年 7 月开始支持「聊天中发送/查看实况照片」功能。

item.title: 美团骑手「屏蔽恶意顾客」全国上线
item.guid: 美团骑手「屏蔽恶意顾客」全国上线
item.description:
Recently, riders in multiple regions reported through the media that the "block malicious users" feature has been fully launched within the Meituan Rider App. Subsequently, Meituan Rider officially confirmed and announced that the "rider blocks malicious customers" feature has been launched nationwide. 近期，多地骑手通过媒体反映，美团骑手 App 内已全面上线「屏蔽恶意用户」功能。随后，美团骑手官方证实并宣布「骑手屏蔽恶意顾客」功能已全国上线。

According to a report by National Business Daily, Meituan's product manager previously stated that during this year's symposium, riders expressed strong demands for "fairness" and "respect." Experts suggested appropriately increasing riders' choices to provide more flexible decision-making space for individual laborers, while also encouraging Meituan to improve the rights and interests of all parties. 每日经济新闻报道，据美团产品负责人此前介绍，今年在恳谈会上，骑手「公平感」与「尊重感」的诉求非常强烈，专家建议可适当增加骑手选择权，为个人劳动者提供更多弹性决策空间，同时鼓励美团完善各方权益。

In response, based on earlier research, Meituan piloted a new feature called "block malicious users" in several cities this September. 对此，基于前期调研，美团于今年 9 月在多个城市试点了「屏蔽恶意用户」这一新功能。

When riders encounter inappropriate behavior such as verbal abuse, harassment, demanding personal information, or causing trouble while intoxicated during delivery, they can choose to upload recordings, videos, or chat logs as evidence to apply to block the user. Within one year, the rider will no longer receive orders from that user. 当骑手在配送过程中遭遇辱骂骚扰、索要个人信息、醉酒滋事等不当行为时，可选择通过上传录音、录像或聊天记录等作为凭证，申请屏蔽该用户，一年内骑手将不再接收其订单。

It is reported that each rider can block a maximum of 2 users, the blocking period is 365 days, it will be automatically lifted upon expiration, and riders can also actively adjust the list at any time. 据悉， 每位骑手最多可屏蔽 2 名用户，屏蔽期为 365 天，期满自动解除，骑手也可随时主动调整名单。

To ensure that the user experience is not affected, even if a rider blocks a user, the system will automatically match other riders. At the same time, through various delivery modes, order subsidies, weather subsidies, dynamic pricing for difficult-to-fulfill locations, and other methods, it ensures that order delivery is not affected. 为了同时保障用户的体验不受影响，即使某位骑手屏蔽了某位用户，系统也会自动匹配其他骑手，同时通过多种配送模式、跑单补贴、天气补贴、难履约点位动态调价等方式，确保订单送达不受影响。

As the scale of the food delivery market expands, friction between food delivery riders and customers is not uncommon. According to media reports, some riders encountered customers who remarked, "If the delivery person doesn't call me 'dad,' I'll give a bad review," and another delivery person received a bad review for not helping a customer throw out trash. After receiving feedback, the platform merely removed the bad review. 随着外卖市场规模的扩大，外卖骑手与顾客的摩擦屡见不鲜。据媒体报道，有骑手遇到顾客备注「外卖员不叫爹就给差评」，还有外卖员没帮顾客扔垃圾遭差评，平台收到反馈后仅仅消除差评了事。

Previously, when the feature was in trial operation, it sparked heated discussion among netizens. Many netizens said, "It should be like this, delivery riders also have the right to choose," while others commented, "Being able to block only two is too few." 此前，该功能试运营时曾引发网友热议，不少网友表示「就应该这样，外卖员也有选择权」，还有网友称「最多只能屏蔽两个太少了」。

item.title: 武汉交管破获首起针对无人驾驶汽车「碰瓷」案
item.guid: 武汉交管破获首起针对无人驾驶汽车「碰瓷」案
item.description:
According to Wuhan traffic police, recently, the Wuhan Public Security Traffic Management Detachment successfully investigated the city's first case of intentional "crash-for-cash" targeting an autonomous vehicle. By leveraging data empowerment and integrating technology with tactics, they broke through traditional case-handling bottlenecks, imposed administrative penalties on the taxi driver involved, and revoked the original erroneous liability determination. 据武汉交警消息，近日，武汉市公安交管支队成功查处全市首例针对无人驾驶汽车的故意「碰瓷」案件，通过数据赋能与技战融合，突破传统办案瓶颈，依法对涉案出租车驾驶员作出行政处罚，并撤销原错误责任认定。

Specifically, on August 5, 2025, when taxi driver He was driving on Zhuodaoquan South Road in Hongshan District, he deliberately accelerated and collided with a "RoboRun" autonomous vehicle (license plate Hubei A44** Test) as it attempted to change lanes, despite having conditions to avoid the collision, causing damage to both vehicles. 具体来看，2025 年 8 月 5 日，出租车驾驶员和某在洪山区卓刀泉南路行驶时，趁「萝卜快跑」无人驾驶车辆（车牌号鄂 A44**试）尝试变道之际，在具备避让条件的情况下故意加速撞击对方，造成两车受损。

Investigators found that He had previously caused an accident with another "RoboRun" test vehicle using the same method on July 23, and received 1900 yuan in compensation. The two accidents were highly consistent in form, both occurring when the autonomous vehicle was changing lanes, with a cumulative amount involved of 3900 yuan. 办案人员发现，和某曾于 7 月 23 日以同样手法与另一辆「萝卜快跑」测试车发生事故，并获赔 1900 元。两起事故形态高度一致，均选在无人驾驶车辆变道时撞击，累计涉案金额 3900 元。

Facing challenges such as difficulty in evidence collection and complex liability determination in new types of cases, the traffic management detachment established a special task force, innovatively applying a "data analysis + professional appraisal + legal support" model, and collaborated with the Hongshan Brigade to conduct a comprehensive investigation. 面对新型案件取证难、责任界定复杂等挑战，交管支队组建专项专班，创新运用「数据研判+专业鉴定+法制支撑」模式，联合洪山大队全面开展侦破。

Through correlation analysis, the task force found that He had abnormal driving trajectories before both accidents, "tailing autonomous vehicles and approaching lane-changing targets." At the same time, in conjunction with judicial appraisal agencies and technical teams, they retrieved the autonomous vehicle's algorithm logs and cloud data, confirming that the autonomous driving system had identified the vehicle behind and maintained a safe distance at the time of the incident, while the taxi exhibited accelerating behavior and failed to take reasonable evasive action. 通过关联分析，专班发现和某在事故前均有「尾随无人驾驶车辆、贴近变道目标」的异常行驶轨迹；同时，联合司法鉴定机构及技术团队，调取无人驾驶车辆算法日志与云端数据，证实事发时无人驾驶系统已识别后方车辆并保持安全距离，而出租车却存在加速行为且未采取合理避让。

Supported by conclusive evidence, the traffic management department legally determined that He bore full responsibility and imposed administrative penalties of a 2000 yuan fine and a three-month suspension of his driver's license. 在确凿证据支撑下，交管部门依法判定和某承担全部责任，并对其处以罚款 2000 元、暂扣驾驶证三个月的行政处罚。

The traffic management detachment stated that the successful handling of this case not only recovered economic losses for the enterprise but also, for the first time, clarified the investigation direction and evidence collection standards for accidents involving intelligent connected vehicles, providing a template for handling similar cases. 交管支队表示，此案的成功办理，不仅为企业挽回经济损失，更首次明确了涉智能网联汽车事故的调查方向与取证标准，为同类案件处置提供了范本。

item.title: 新车「线上上牌」本月起推行
item.guid: 新车「线上上牌」本月起推行
item.description:
Starting from November 1, the Ministry of Public Security will fully implement the "one-stop service" for new domestic small passenger vehicle registration, while also introducing convenient online processing for driver's license exams, online replacement of motor vehicle registration certificates, and online transfer of motor vehicle registration information. 自 11 月 1 日起，公安部全面推行国产小客车新车上牌「一件事」，同时推出便利网上办理驾驶人考试业务、网上补换领机动车登记证书、机动车转籍信息网上转递等。

According to previous CCTV News reports, the specific contents are as follows: 据央视新闻此前消息，具体内容如下：

    Fully implement the "one-stop service" for new domestic small passenger vehicle registration: Interconnect information with departments such as taxation and financial supervision to share and verify vehicle sales invoices, purchase tax, insurance, and other information, achieving digital processing for all new domestic small passenger vehicle registration businesses, exempting the public from submitting paper materials when handling business; one-stop new vehicle registration, through the "Traffic Management 12123" APP, integrates online car selection, insurance purchase links, license plate selection, and registration services, allowing registration from home with license plates mailed to your doorstep.

    Convenient online processing for driver's license examination services: For those unable to attend the driver's license examination at the scheduled time, applicants are allowed to cancel the examination one day in advance via the "Traffic Management 12123" APP; for trainees who apply to change their permitted driving model after registration, it is convenient to process it through the "Traffic Management 12123" APP.

    Online replacement of motor vehicle registration certificates: For cases where a motor vehicle registration certificate is destroyed, lost, or damaged, it is convenient for motor vehicle owners to apply for a replacement certificate through the "Traffic Management 12123" APP.

    Promote online transfer of motor vehicle registration information: Fully implement the online electronic transfer of motor vehicle archives, allowing applicants to directly apply for and process motor vehicle transfers at the vehicle's new registration location, eliminating the need to return to the original registration location for vehicle inspection and retrieval of paper archives.

item.title: 《特立独行》定档 2026 暑期
item.description:
Recently, the comedy film "Maverick" has been scheduled for release in the summer of 2026. 日前，喜剧电影《特立独行》定档 2026 暑期。

The film tells the story of Superman Wang Changhai being specially dispatched back to his hometown for training, and forming a superhero combat team with local branch elder Old Xia. However, even superheroes have to toast when they arrive, and Wang Changhai, who doesn't understand social etiquette, causes various hilarious accidents as soon as he takes action. 该片讲述超人王长海被特派回老家锻炼，和当地分会长老夏一起组建超英战斗小队的故事，结果超级英雄来了这也得敬酒，不懂人情世故的王长海一出手就闹出各种爆笑事故。

The film is directed/written by Xing Wenxiong, starring Bai Jingting and Wei Xiang. 影片由邢文雄导演/编剧，白敬亭、魏翔领衔主演。

item.title: 电影《过往人生》确认引进
item.guid: 电影《过往人生》确认引进
item.description:
According to Sina Film news, the movie "Past Lives" announced at the recent Hengdian "National Film Promotion Conference" that its introduction to Chinese mainland cinemas has been confirmed, with the release date yet to be determined. 据新浪电影消息，电影《过往人生》在日前的横店「全国影片推介会」宣布确认引进中国内地院线，档期待定。

Released in 2023, the film focuses on the love and growth story of a couple who met in Korea and reunited in the US, a "destiny" spanning twenty-four years of their lives. It is the debut feature film by Celine Song ("Materialists"), starring Greta Lee and Teo Yoo, and was nominated for Best Picture and Best Original Screenplay at that year's Academy Awards. 该片 2023 年推出，聚焦一对在韩国相识、美国重逢的情侣的爱情和成长故事，一段横跨人生二十四年的「因缘」。是席琳·宋 (《物质主义者》) 的首部导演长片，格蕾塔·李、刘台午主演，提名当届奥斯卡最佳影片和最佳原创剧本。

item.title: 《年轻母亲之家》确认引进中国内地院线
item.guid: 《年轻母亲之家》确认引进中国内地院线
item.description:
According to Watchmen Hollywood news, at the recent Hengdian "National Film Promotion Conference", China Film announced that the Dardenne brothers' new film "Young Mother's Home" has been confirmed for introduction to Chinese mainland cinemas, with the release date pending. 据守望好莱坞消息，在日前的横店「全国影片推介会」上，中影宣布：达内兄弟新片《年轻母亲之家》确认引进中国内地院线，待定档。

The film won Best Screenplay at this year's Cannes Film Festival, starring Babette Warbiek, Elsa Houben, Janaïna Haloi, Lucy Laurell, and Samia Himi. It tells the story of five young women who became mothers as minors, living in a mother and baby shelter. 该片获今年戛纳电影节最佳编剧，巴贝特·沃比克、艾尔莎·霍本、贾奈娜·哈罗伊、露西·劳瑞尔、萨米亚·希尔米出演，讲述五个未成年就当了母亲的年轻女子在一个母婴庇护中心的故事。

早报
